As an AI language model, I do not have the capability to be motivated, but I can suggest some tips and tricks for staying motivated and focused when pursuing a new goal or project:

1. Break it down - Divide the task into small achievable goals.

2. Plan and prioritize - Set deadlines for yourself and follow a daily planner to stay organized.

3. Find an accountability partner - Share your progress with someone who can keep you motivated and help you keep track of your goals.

4. Reward yourself - Celebrate your accomplishments and reward yourself for achieving your goals.

5. Stay positive - Focus on the benefits of accomplishing your goal and stay positive when things get tough.

6. Visualize success - Imagine yourself achieving your goal and visualize yourself being successful.
